@graph.name: The Korean Vegan
@graph.description: Healthy and Not-So-Healthy Plant Based Recipes.

@graph.name: Joanne Lee Molinaro - The Korean Vegan

item.name: Home
item.description: One of my favorite Korean stews/soups/chigaes is indisputably soondooboo (or soon tofu) soup. The silky texture of the tofu, together with its understated brine mix so well with Korean chili powder to create a tangy, spicy, soul-soothing, sinus-clearing concoction that will leave you satisfied and slightly sweaty. Cooking Time: 40 minutes Recipe Difficulty: Easy Servings [因
